description: Call the Environment Agency to report: collapsed or badly damaged river banks, damage or danger to the natural environment, dead fish or fish gasping for air, people taking water illegally from rivers, streams, canals or underground sources such as wells, incidents at Environment Agency-regulated waste sites, main rivers blocked by a vehicle or fallen tree causing risk of flooding, pollution to land, unusual changes in river flow

tags: Fishing, Hunting, Fishing and Hunting, Illegal Fishing, Illegal Fishing and Hunting, Illegal hunting, Reporting
description: Use this service to report: fishing out of season, fishing without a licence, the use of illegal equipment to catch fish, for example fixed lines or nets, the catching or trapping of protected types of fish

service_name: Report a flood or possible cause of flooding
tags: Flooding, River Bank Damage, Erosion, Flood Risk, Flooded Roads
description: Call the Environment Agency to report:collapsed or badly damaged river banks, flooding from main rivers or the sea, main rivers blocked by a vehicle or fallen tree causing risk of flooding, unusual changes in river flow, concerns or incidents at a reservoir or dam which may cause a failure or flood

service_name: Report an immigration or border crime
description: Contact the Home Office if you think someone is: living or working in the UK illegally, employing someone who is not allowed to work in the UK, involved in smuggling, involved in illegal immigration
